description:
Even the most enthusiastic D&D player can't carry every sourcebook with them at all times, but you never know which books you'll need for any given game. The DnD 4e Compendium uses the official Wizards.com API to provide you with access to all the information you'll need to settle rule disagreements, check the stats on your new weapon, or just satisfy your curiosity about any race or class you meet.

NOTE: All Compendium entries require an active D&D Insider account to view.

-FEATURES-
* Keyword and filter searches
* Automatic login for viewing entries
* Landscape view
* Open Character Builder files (.dnd4e)

-New in 1.3.8-
* Added support for HP Pre3
